CustomField.formula: If (Combined_Last_Gift_Date__c = Last_Gift_Date__c , Last_Gift_Amount__c , if(Combined_Last_Gift_Date__c = Last_Soft_Credit_Date__c , Last_Soft_Credit_Gift_Amount__c , Last_Partial_Soft_Credit_Gift_Amount__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The amount of the last gift received from this Account (including hard, soft and partial soft credit gifts). Based on NPSP rollups.
CustomField.label: Combined Last Gift Amount
